channel.title: Reproduced Paper on Orjan Ameye
channel.description: Recent content in Reproduced Paper on Orjan Ameye

item.title: Preparation of nonclassical states in cavities with a moving mirror
item.description: Reproducing the results of Bose et al. on nonclassical states in cavities with a moving mirror.

item.title: Bloch oscillation in a dynamically modulated ring resonator
item.description: We show how a ring resonator with a dynamic refractive index modulation can exhibit Bloch oscillation of light along the frequency axis, as a result of an effective force for photons induced by the modulation.
